review.title: “Company very disorganized.”
review.pros: Pros – At the beginning of my experience. I had the opportunity to manage projects and grow professionally. Over the years, the activities have slowed down and almost stops now.
review.cons: Cons – Company in failure. The employment contract is not respected. Failure to invest on a commercial side. Inability to manage communications with employees and to the various sites.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Comply with the employee and the employment contract. Investing in employees and their formation. Select personnel management specialist.
